Erik Reinertsen     Blog     Research     Tech     Teaching     Talks

Papers on AI in medicine

Organized by application area.

Anesthesiology

Bispec during proprofol + remifentanil: Lee et al. Anesthesiology (2017)
Post-op mortaltiy: Lee et al. Anesthesiology (2018)
Hypotension in ICU or OR from a-line: Hatib et al. Anesthesiology (2018)
Postinduction hypotension: Kendale et al. Anesthesiology (2018)
Intraoperative hypoxemia: Lundberg et al. Nature BME (2018)
Identifying high-risk surgical patients: Corey et al. PLoS Med. (2018)

Critical care

Sepsis in ED triage: Horng et al. PLoS One (2017)
Septic shock in the ICU: Henry et al. Sci Trans Med (2015)
Sepsis in ICU: Nemati et al. Crit Care Med (2017)
ICU mortality: Meiring et al. PLoS One (2018)

Oncology

Glioma outcomes: Mobadersanya et al. PNAS (2018)
Mortality s/p cancer chemo: Elfiky et al. JAMA Network Open (2018)
Outcomes in colorectal cancer: Bychkov et al. Sci Reports (2018)
Drug combo for multiple myeloma: Rashid et al. Sci Trans Med (2018)
Skin cancer: Esteva et al. Nature (2018)
Nonpigmented skin cancer: Tschandl et al. JAMA Derm. (2018)
NSCLC from histopathology: Coudray et al. Nature Med (2018)
Metastatic breast cancer detection: Liu et al. Arch Pathol Lab Med (2018) & Steiner et al. Am J Surg Path (2018)

Cardiology

Echocardiography: Zhang et al. Circulation (2018)
Arrhythmia detection & classification: Hannun et al. Nature Med (2018)
Atrial fibrillation: Shashikumar et al. IEEE EMBS (2017)
Myocardial ischemia via angiography: Hae et al. PLoS Med (2018)
12-lead EKG vs. conventional algo: Smith et al. J Elec (2018)

Imaging

Acute intracranial hemorrhage: Lee et al. Nature BME (2018)
Acute neurological events from head CTs: Titano et al. Nature Med (2018) & Chilamkurthy et al. Lancet (2018)
Mammographic breast density: Lehman et al. Radiology (2018)
Diabetic retinopathy (retrospective): De Fauw et al. Nature Med (2018)
Diabetic retinopathy (prospective pilot): Kanagasingam et al. JAMA Network Open (2018)
Diabetic retinopathy (prospective pilot in primary care offices): Abramoff et al. npj Dig Med (2018)
Congenital cataracts (multihospital collaborative platform): Long et al. Nature BME (2018)
Classifying 14 different pathologies from CXR (CheXNeXt): Rajpurkar et al. PLoS Med. (2018)
Pneumothorax from CXR: Taylor, Mielke, & Mongan. PLoS Med. (2018)
Pneumonia from CXR: Zech et al. PLoS Med. (2018)
Radiology text report classification: Banerjee et al. AI in Med. (2018)
Knee MRI: Bien et al. PLoS Med. (2018)

General (readmissions, mortality, dx)

Readmission: Shameer et al. Pacific Symp Biocomp (2017)
Daily risk of C. dif: Oh et al. Inf Control & Hosp Epi (2018)
Dx from EMR data: Miotto et al. Sci Reports (2016)
Dx from EMR data: Yang et al. Sci Reports (2018)
Predict dz onset from lab tests: arXiv:1608.00647v3 [cs.LG]
In-hospital mortality, unplanned readmission, prolonged LOS, final discharge dx: Rajkomar et al. npj Digit Med (2018)
Mortality for palliative care consults: arXiv:1711.06402v1 [cs.CY]
ED admission from EMR: Rahimian et al. PLoS Med. (2018)
Relationship between IgE to specific allergens and asthma: Platts-Mills & Perzanowski. PLoS Med. (2018)
AKI after PCI: Huang et al. PLoS Med. (2018)

Neuro & psych

Dementia: Cleret et al. JMIR (2018)
Alzheimerâ€™s disease: Mathotaarachchi et al. Neurobiol Aging (2017)
Suicide: Walsh et al. Clin Psych Sci (2017)
Delirium: Wong et al. JAMA Network Open (2018)
Schizophrenia from HR data: Reinertsen et al. Phys Meas (2017)
Schizophrenia from wearables data: Reinertsen et al. Phys Meas (2018)
PTSD from HR data: Reinertsen et al. Phys Meas (2017)

Basic science

Cell counting, detection, & morphometry: Falk et al. Nature Methods (2018)
Prediction of cancer cell neoantigens from HLA peptide mass spec: Bulik-Sullivan et al. Nature Biotech (2018)
GANs for super-resolution microscopy: Wang et al. Nature Methods (2018)
